content.raw: there is a recent [PR in ign-cmake](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/pull-requests/97/rename-findogre-to-findignogre/diff) to rename `FindOGRE` to `FindIgnOGRE`. I think we’ll be making a new ign-cmake prerelease soon
content.html: there is a recent PR in ign-cmake to rename FindOGRE to FindIgnOGRE. I think we’ll be making a new ign-cmake prerelease soon

content.raw:
Is there a corresponding PR that is required for this one to work? If I update ign-rendering to include these changes \(and only ign-rendering\) I don’t get support for Ogre built:

‌

```shell
CMake Warning at /home/dhood/delphyne_ws/install/share/cmake/ignition-cmake1/cmake1/IgnUtils.cmake:188 (find_package):
  By not providing "FindIgnOGRE.cmake" in CMAKE_MODULE_PATH this project has
  asked CMake to find a package configuration file provided by "IgnOGRE", but
  CMake did not find one.

  Could not find a package configuration file provided by "IgnOGRE"
  (requested version 1.8.0) with any of the following names:

    IgnOGREConfig.cmake
    ignogre-config.cmake

  Add the installation prefix of "IgnOGRE" to CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH or set
  "IgnOGRE_DIR" to a directory containing one of the above files.  If
  "IgnOGRE" provides a separate development package or SDK, be sure it has
  been installed.

  Could not find pkg-config information for IgnOGRE.  It was not provided by

  to ign_find_package(~).  This is most likely an error in this project's use
  of ign-cmake.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  CMakeLists.txt:47 (ign_find_package)
This warning is for project developers.  Use -Wno-dev to suppress it.

CMake Warning at /home/dhood/delphyne_ws/install/share/cmake/ignition-cmake1/cmake1/IgnUtils.cmake:188 (find_package):
  By not providing "FindOGRE2.cmake" in CMAKE_MODULE_PATH this project has
  asked CMake to find a package configuration file provided by "OGRE2", but
  CMake did not find one.

  Could not find a package configuration file provided by "OGRE2" (requested

    OGRE2Config.cmake
    ogre2-config.cmake

  Add the installation prefix of "OGRE2" to CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH or set
```

content.html:
Is there a corresponding PR that is required for this one to work? If I update ign-rendering to include these changes (and only ign-rendering) I don’t get support for Ogre built:

‌

CMake Warning at /home/dhood/delphyne_ws/install/share/cmake/ignition-cmake1/cmake1/IgnUtils.cmake:188 (find_package):

  asked CMake to find a package configuration file provided by "IgnOGRE", but
  CMake did not find one.

  (requested version 1.8.0) with any of the following names:

pull_request.title: Several MSVC fixes: enable IgnFindOGRE, ambious use of templates and CreateWindow naming conflict

pullrequest.title: Several MSVC fixes: enable IgnFindOGRE, ambious use of templates and CreateWindow naming conflict

pull_request.title: Several MSVC fixes: enable IgnFindOGRE, ambious use of templates and CreateWindow naming conflict

update.description:
Last round of Windows fixes \(although we still we have a linking issue to resolve\):

* Enable the use of IgnFindOGRE
* MSVC complained about the ambiguos use of type Node in templates \(coming from multiple heritance\)
* Change API: [CreateWindow seems to be part of a Windows API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/ms632679(v=vs.85).aspx) I renamed it to CreateNewWindow but feel free to change the name if you prefer something different.

Testing run on Windows: [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign\_render\_win/199/console](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_render_win/199/console)
update.title: Several MSVC fixes: enable IgnFindOGRE, ambious use of templates and CreateWindow naming conflict

content.raw: I think that I found the problem somehow before changing to IgnOGRE, you are right it is not needed. I removed it.

pull_request.title: Several MSVC fixes: enable IgnFindOGRE, ambious use of templates and CreateWindow naming conflict

pullrequest.title: Several MSVC fixes: enable IgnFindOGRE, ambious use of templates and CreateWindow naming conflict

content.raw: thanks for the fixes. I renamed `CreateNewWindow` to `CreateRenderWindow` and made some style fixes in [f0987b5](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/commits/f0987b520a24200ae16e5015594b434c7b975728). I just have one minor comment about the `Bites` component otherwise this looks good to me.
content.html: thanks for the fixes. I renamed CreateNewWindow to CreateRenderWindow and made some style fixes in f0987b5. I just have one minor comment about the Bites component otherwise this looks good to me.

content.raw: is the Bites component needed on windows? I think it’s mainly used by the samples in ogre but we’re not using it in ign-rendering.
content.html: is the Bites component needed on windows? I think it’s mainly used by the samples in ogre but we’re not using it in ign-rendering.
